Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 47th overall pick, by Syracuse in 1977...
Injured on 5/22/1977 with a Sore Knee, out for one week...
Injured on 4/6/1979 with a Stress Fractured Ulna, out for 2 weeks...
Injured on 6/13/1979 with a Knocked Out Teeth, out for 2 days...
Had first career hit on 4/12/1982, off Riley Stiff (PIL)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/25/1982, off Wilbert Boehmer (CI)...
Injured on 6/30/1983 with a Pulled Medial Collateral Ligament, out for 2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1987, hitting .667 with 4 HR, 6 RBI...
Injured on 4/21/1990 with a Fractured Ulna, out for 5 weeks...
Won World Championship with Syracuse in 1990...
